summary: Frontend testing of Training Engine wizard (5-step flow). All 3 bug fixes verified working: 1) Example positions show actual mistake FEN (not starting position), 2) Reflection step includes chessboard with mistake position, 3) Phase Context framed as 'Weekly Focus' with badges. All 9 test features passed.

verified: 'This Week's Focus' badge visible at top of page
'Weekly Focus' badge visible next to active phase (Stability)
Example Position shows Move 20 (actual mistake, not starting position)
'Played: Ba6' and 'Better: Nd5' moves displayed
Navigation arrows work (1/5 to 5/5 example positions)
Layer breakdown shows Stability, Conversion, Structure, Precision costs
'Your Pattern' title visible
'Threat Blindness' dominant pattern displayed with 45% strength
All patterns in phase listed: Threat Blindness (45%), One Move Threats (37%), Hanging Pieces (17%), Rushing (1%)
'See Your Rules' button navigates to Step 3
'Your 2 Rules' title visible
Two actionable rules displayed with numbers 1 and 2
Tip section about sticky note visible
'Reflect on Last Game' button navigates to Step 4
'Quick Reflection' title visible
Chessboard displayed with mistake position (Position from Move 20)
'You played: Ba6' and 'Better: Nd5' move info displayed
All 4 reflection tags visible: Rushing, Threat Blindness, Hanging Pieces, One-Move Threats
Optional textarea for additional reflection present
'Save & Continue' and 'Skip reflection for now' options work
'Training Position' title visible
'Practice recognizing threat blindness' subtitle matches micro habit
Chessboard shows actual position (Position 1 of 3)
'Your Game' badge indicates source of drill
'Played: Ba6 (lost 9440 centipawns)' and 'Better: Nd5' displayed
Previous/Next buttons for drill navigation
'Done' and 'Back' buttons functional
Step indicator dots visible (5 dots for 5 steps)
Next/Back button navigation works through all 5 steps
Step indicator shows progress (filled/unfilled dots)

bug1_starting_fen.issue: Example positions loaded starting FEN instead of mistake position
bug1_starting_fen.evidence: Example Position shows Move 20 with pieces in middle of board, not starting position. Played/Better moves confirm mistake data is loaded.

bug2_reflection_no_board.evidence: Step 4 (Quick Reflection) displays CoachBoard with 'Position from Move 20' label and mistake position FEN.

bug3_weekly_focus_framing.issue: Phase Context wasn't framed as weekly focus
bug3_weekly_focus_framing.evidence: 'This Week's Focus' badge at top, 'Weekly Focus' badge next to active phase, 'focus on this for the week' text visible.

test_credentials: Use Dev Login button on landing page
context_for_next_testing_agent: Training Engine wizard (5-step flow) fully tested. All steps accessible: 1) Phase Context with weekly focus badges and example positions, 2) Micro Habit/Pattern with percentages, 3) Your 2 Rules, 4) Quick Reflection with board and tags, 5) Training Drills. CoachBoard component uses 'position' prop for static display. Test user has Stability as active phase with Threat Blindness pattern.
